StringTable.Label: Tactic_Format_LiberateDescription
StringTable.String: Create splinter faction, with {VALUE} [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS] for {DURATION} Months

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_PlanetaryAssault_Description
StringTable.String: Follow general siege protocol to wear down the planet and eventually exert a total claim over the planet. Siege protocol focuses on minimizing casualties and collateral damage.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_OrbitalBombardment_Description
StringTable.String: Use ship-mounted artillery to wreak havoc and destruction across the planet. The devastation caused by an orbital bombardment makes a world easier to conquer at the cost of favor and infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_Propaganda_Description
StringTable.String: Employ psychological and media tactics to win the hearts and minds of the populace. Slowly bring the citizenry to accept their change in ownership, preserving morale, life, and infrastructure.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_BiologicalAttacks_Description
StringTable.String: Use genetically engineered pathogens targeted at the citizenry. Facilitate a faster invasion without damaging the existing infrastructure but make the planet less inhabitable by organic life.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_EMPAttacks_Description
StringTable.String: Use targeted EMP bursts to disrupt production and damage synthetic citizens. Facilitate a faster invasion without damaging the existing infrastructure but slow down manufacturing and damage tech.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_ShatterAttacks_Description
StringTable.String: Use target frequencies that cause physical damage to silicon-based lifeforms. Facilitate a faster invasion without damaging the existing infrastructure but damaging the planet's raw materials.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_SurfaceInvasions_Description
StringTable.String: Put units on the planet's surface to conduct an invasion. Units can minimize infrastructure damage, but the ensuing battles will cost some lives and those that survive will take longer to adapt to new authority.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_AnnihilateTargets_Description
StringTable.String: Show no mercy. Unleash all havoc upon the planet. Bombard it with artillery and send in the troops to eliminate resistance. Use efficiency and brutality to ensure nothing of the enemy remains at the end of the siege.

StringTable.Label: InvasionTactic_Liberate_Description
StringTable.String: Bring freedom to the people. Carefully choose targets and utilize propaganda tactics to revoke the authority of the current owner. The planet will not be conquered but instead will be allowed to become its own faction.
